blogPost.excerpt: Have you ever wanted to search for a remote job without getting tracked, being forced to sign in, having your resume crawled, or experiencing "location bias"? Ever felt like your job search has been at the expense of your privacy? We have. And we're fixing it.
blogPost.body: Have you ever wanted to search for a remote job without getting tracked, being forced to sign in, having your resume crawled, or experiencing "location bias"? Ever felt like your job search has been at the expense of your privacy? We have. And we're fixing it.
blogPost.title: Remote Hill - Privacy-centric, international, remote-only job board
blogPost.author: Nathan Clark

localize.description: 你是否曾经想找一份远程工作，而不被跟踪、不被强制登录、不被抓取简历、不遭遇 "位置偏见"？有没有觉得自己的求职是以牺牲自己的隐私为代价的？我们有。而且我们正在解决这个问题。
localize.tagline: 以隐私为中心的国际远程招聘网站。

localize.description: 你是否曾經想找一份遠程工作，而不被跟蹤、不被強制登錄、不被抓取簡歷、不遭遇 "位置偏見"？有沒有覺得自己的求職是以犧牲自己的隱私爲代價的？我們有。而且我們正在解決這個問題。
localize.tagline: 以隱私爲中心的國際遠程招聘網站。
